mapper.select: select remittancetransaction_id, remittancetransaction_name, remittancetransaction_cardnumber, remittancetransaction_blank, remittancetransaction_price, remittancetransaction_time, remittancetransaction_current, remittancetransaction_number, remittancetransaction_payuserid from js_bank_account.remittancetransaction where remittancetransaction_id = #{remittancetransactionId}

select remittancetransaction_id, remittancetransaction_name, remittancetransaction_cardnumber, remittancetransaction_blank, remittancetransaction_price, remittancetransaction_time, remittancetransaction_current, remittancetransaction_number, remittancetransaction_payuserid from js_bank_account.remittancetransaction limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into js_bank_account.remittancetransaction(remittancetransaction_name, remittancetransaction_cardnumber, remittancetransaction_blank, remittancetransaction_price, remittancetransaction_time, remittancetransaction_current, remittancetransaction_number, remittancetransaction_payuserid) values (#{remittancetransactionName}, #{remittancetransactionCardnumber}, #{remittancetransactionBlank}, #{remittancetransactionPrice}, #{remittancetransactionTime}, #{remittancetransactionCurrent}, #{remittancetransactionNumber}, #{remittancetransactionPayuserid})
mapper.update:
update js_bank_account.remittancetransaction
remittancetransaction_name = #{remittancetransactionName},
remittancetransaction_cardnumber = #{remittancetransactionCardnumber},
remittancetransaction_blank = #{remittancetransactionBlank},
remittancetransaction_price = #{remittancetransactionPrice},
remittancetransaction_time = #{remittancetransactionTime},
remittancetransaction_current = #{remittancetransactionCurrent},
remittancetransaction_number = #{remittancetransactionNumber},
remittancetransaction_payuserid = #{remittancetransactionPayuserid},
where remittancetransaction_id = #{remittancetransactionId}
